history.proof: intros d sigma H. unfold DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [d0 ad0]. hauto lq: on use: DTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar.

exceptions.exn: In environment d0 : preDTA ad0 : ad sigma : signature H : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta d0 ad0) sigma Unable to unify "match DTA_kill ?M1855 ?M1854 with | dta d _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d ?M1856 end" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) ad0 with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) ad0 | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta d _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma end".

In environment H0 : forall (d : DTA) (m : Map bool) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill m d) sigma d0 : preDTA ad0 : ad sigma : signature H : predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma s : state Heqo : MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) ad0 = Some s Unable to unify "predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma" with "predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) sigma".

original: intros d sigma H. unfold DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [d0 ad0]. simpl. apply DTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar. apply H.
